div.p: Proud to be serving as your Superintendent. Follow me to see all of the great things going on in CHUSD!
Hi #822chat hello from California! My name is Mitch - high school teacher and organized binder guy.
@mamahampy1922 @GoCHUSD I just mailed a letter to them thanking them for everything they are doing at home 😊.
⁦@GoCHUSD⁩ we need our parents to remember they too are Rockstars!!! https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10157787602956141&set=a.10151014457556141&type=3
This would be all my kids...and myself @GoCHUSD
